name: metadata
description: Utilities for reading and writing the metadata of JavaScript functions.

classes.name: MetadataStore
classes.description: Stores metadata and provides helpers for searching and adding to it.

methods.description: Searches metadata and returns the first instance of a particular type.
methods.name: first

params.name: type
params.description: The metadata type to look for.

params.name: searchPrototype
params.description: Indicates whether or not to search the inheritance hierarchy for metadata.

return.description: Returns an instance of the specified metadata type if found; otherwise null.

methods.description: Searches metadata and returns true if a particular type of metadata is present.
methods.name: has

params.name: type
params.description: The metadata type to look for.

params.name: searchPrototype
params.description: Indicates whether or not to search the inheritance hierarchy for metadata.

return.description: Returns true if found; false null.

methods.description: Searches metadata for all instances of a particular type.
methods.name: all

params.name: type
params.description: The metadata type to look for.

params.name: searchPrototype
params.description: Indicates whether or not to search the inheritance hierarchy for metadata.

return.description: Returns an array of the specified metadata type.

methods.description: Searches metadata and returns the first instance of a particular type or creates and adds one if none is found.
methods.name: first

params.name: type
params.description: The metadata type to look for.

params.name: searchPrototype
params.description: Indicates whether or not to search the inheritance hierarchy for metadata.

return.description: Returns an instance of the specified metadata type.

params.name: instance
params.description: The metadata instance to add.

methods.description: Locates the metadata on the owner.
methods.name: on

params.name: owner
params.description: The owner of the metadata.

methods.description: Adds a function capable of locating metadata.
methods.name: locator

params.name: locator
params.description: Configures a function which searches for metadata.

classes.name: Origin
classes.description: A metadata annotation that describes the origin module of the function to which it's attached.

params.name: moduleId
params.description: The origin module id.

params.name: moduleMember
params.description: The name of the export in the origin module.

methods.description: Get the Origin annotation for the specified function.
methods.name: get

params.name: fn
params.description: The function to inspect for Origin metadata.

methods.description: Set the Origin annotation for the specified function.
methods.name: set

params.name: fn
params.description: The function to set the Origin metadata on.

params.name: fn
params.description: The Origin metadata to store on the function.

classes.name: ResourceType
classes.description: An abstract base class used to designate resources which can be loaded and registered in a framework.

methods.description: Implemented by resource metadata to allow it to self-configure and load dependencies.
methods.name: load

params.name: container
params.description: The dependency injection container to use for service resolution.

params.name: target
params.description: The target that is decorated by this ResourceType metadata.

return.description: Returns a promise for itself, resolving when all dependent resources are loaded.

methods.description: Implemented by resources to allow them to register themselved in a resource registry.
methods.name: register

params.name: registry
params.description: The resource registry that this resource needs to be registered in.

params.name: name
params.description: A possible name override for the resource.
